# Sandstone
VR exploration game set in an Ancient Egyptian like, sci-fi environment. Download the latest release [here](https://github.com/Edvinas01/sandstone/releases/latest).

## Requirements
- Oculus Rift or Rift S VR headset
- Oculus App
- Unity 2019.3.x

## Recommended
- Blender 2.82
- Rider 2019.3 IDE
